dict.acceptation: 决心要；将（财产等）遗赠某人；用意志力驱使（某事发生）；
愿意， 希望， 想要；

sent.orig: Will you buy two loaves of bread?
sent.trans: 下面一组练习是把 will 跟它的否定式 will not 也就是 won't 做个比较。

sent.orig: I shall (not will) have to buy another ticket.
sent.trans: 我将不用will不得不再买一张票。

sent.orig: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
sent.trans: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。

sent.orig: Your bodies and names will perish, but the river will flow on for ever -- the names of mediocre writers will be forgottern, but those of the great masters will live.
sent.trans: 尔曹身与名俱灭，不废江河万古流。

sent.orig: He will glorify Me, for He will take of Mine and will disclose it to you.
sent.trans: 约16:14他要荣耀我．因为他要将受于我的、告诉你们。
